name: Lesser Banishing Ritual of the Pentagram
description: The foundational banishing ritual of the Western Magical Tradition. Used to purify and protect the ritual space.

steps.instruction_text: Stand in the center of your space. Take a moment to center yourself. Touch your forehead.
Touch your chest, pointing downward toward your feet.
Touch your right shoulder.
Touch your left shoulder.
Clasp your hands upon your breast.
Turn to face the East. Prepare to trace the banishing pentagram.

Trace a banishing Earth pentagram before you in the air. Start from the lower-left hip, trace up to above the head, down to the right hip, up to the left shoulder, across to the right shoulder, and back to the lower-left hip.
Point to the center of the pentagram and vibrate the Divine Name.
Turn to face the South. Keep your arm extended, tracing a line of light from East to South.
Trace a banishing Earth pentagram before you in the air.
Point to the center of the pentagram and vibrate the Divine Name.
Turn to face the West. Keep your arm extended, tracing a line of light.
Trace a banishing Earth pentagram before you in the air.
Point to the center of the pentagram and vibrate the Divine Name.
Turn to face the North. Keep your arm extended, tracing a line of light.
Trace a banishing Earth pentagram before you in the air.
Point to the center of the pentagram and vibrate the Divine Name.
Return to face the East, completing the circle of light.
Extend your arms in the form of a cross and say: Before me, Raphael. Behind me, Gabriel. On my right hand, Michael. On my left hand, Auriel.
Visualize: For about me flames the Pentagram, and in the column shines the six-rayed Star.
Repeat the Qabalistic Cross. Touch your forehead.
Touch your chest, pointing downward.
Touch your right shoulder.
Touch your left shoulder.
Clasp your hands upon your breast. The ritual is complete.

name: Middle Pillar Exercise
description: An energy-building exercise that activates the central pillar of the Tree of Life within the practitioner's body.

steps.instruction_text: Stand upright, facing East. Visualize a sphere of brilliant white light above your head – the Crown (Kether).
Focus on the white sphere above your head. Vibrate the Divine Name slowly and powerfully.
See a beam of light descend from the Crown to your throat. A sphere of lavender light forms at the throat – Daath.
Focus on the lavender sphere at your throat. Vibrate the Divine Name.
The beam continues down to your heart center. A sphere of golden light forms – Tiphareth.
Focus on the golden sphere at your heart. Vibrate the Divine Name.
The beam descends to your groin area. A sphere of violet light forms – Yesod.
Focus on the violet sphere. Vibrate the Divine Name.
The beam descends to your feet. A sphere of black and olive light forms – Malkuth.
Focus on the sphere at your feet. Vibrate the Divine Name.
Now visualize all five spheres connected by the central beam of light, pulsing with energy. Feel the Middle Pillar alive within you. The exercise is complete.
